ValidationRule.description: If specifying a Number of Instructor Hours, Number of Instructors and Instructor Hourly Rate must be populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( !ISBLANK( Number_of_Instructor_Hours__c ), OR( ISBLANK( Number_of_Instructors__c ), ISBLANK( Instructor_Hourly_Rate__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If specifying a Number of Instructor Hours, Number of Instructors and Instructor Hourly Rate must be populated
